event.title: Fellowship Meeting in Berlin, Germany
event.body:
The local Fellowship Group will meet on 8 January to welcome the New Year. The location is as always the NewThinkingStore at Tucholskystra√üe 48.
Mario Behling will talk about LXDE, the LXDE community as well as the Free Software community in Asia, esp. Bejing, Taiwan, Shenzhen and Singapur.
Guests are welcome to join in and chat about issues around Free Software.
